welcome.title: Welcome to Stegos Wallet
bootstrap.step.one.label: Password protection
bootstrap.step.two.label: Sync
bootstrap.step.three.label: Bugs & Terms of Use
protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.description: Set a password to prevent an unauthorized access to Stegos Wallet data on your computer, including account names, transactions and public wallet keys.
protect.attention: Make sure you remeber your password. Do not share it. Losing your password requires resetting Stegos Wallet and re-adding accounts. Resetting Stegos Wallet does not affect your crypto assets.
syncing.in.progress.description: Your wallet is synchronizing with the blockchain...
syncing.failed.description: Something went wrong, please restart your wallet
terms.title: Bugs and Terms of Use
terms.share.data: Share anonymized data to help improve Stegos Wallet
terms.send.reports: Automatically send reports to help Stegos fix bugs
terms.accept:
By continuing, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to
the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.sort.account.name: Account name
account.receive.description: Click 'Receive' button below to get your account address to start receiving tokens.
account.restore.description: Click 'Restore from recovery phrase' button to restore your existing account.
edit.account.title: Edit Account
edit.account.backup.subtitle: Account Backup
edit.account.name.title: Account Name
edit.account.backup.title: Account Backup
delete.account: Your account “{name}” will be removed from this device. You cannot revert this operation!
backup.step.one.label: Write down
backup.step.two.label: Verify
backup.step.one.description: The phrase is case sensitive. Please make sure you write it down. You will need it to restore your account.
backup.step.two.description: In order to restore your existing account, please fill all words from the recovery phrase in correct order.

send.with.certificate.description: Payment certificate will be generated. In case if you will need it, you will be able to prove that you made the transaction above.
send.transaction.sent.title: Transaction sent
send.transaction.sent.description: Your account balance will be update once the blockchain has confirmed the transaction.
send.transaction.sent.certificate: Payment certificate for this transaction will be available in Last Operations for {account}
restore.title: Restore Account
restore.subtitle: In order to restore your existing account, please fill all words from the recovery phrase in correct order.

portfolio.description.one: Here's the summary of your 1 account
